reviews.review_msg: The exams were based on questions from the problem sets (answers were provided) and on glossary terms from  the textbook. If you understand the problem set questions, and memorize the glossary terms, you will get at least a B+ in this course. If you do the readings and understand them, you will do even better. Interesting course, great professor.

At first I didn't like him because he didn't seem serious about teaching but he is so helpful when you ask a question.  Class does get boring sometimes but he is really funny when you actually listen to him.  He's a genius.
Very funny professor, but his lectures are kinda boring.  Don't buy the textbook ("Discovering Genomics, Proteomics, and Bioinformatics") its useless, just read the journal articles.
